name: SINK or SWIM (itch)
description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Survival simulation game where you attempt to survive, lost in one of earth's many vast seas and oceans.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You find yourself adrift in the middle of the ocean.. shock has erased the catastrophic events that brought you here from your memory. It makes no difference.. It's only a matter of time..

Exhaustion kicks in..

Dehydration kicks in..

Hypothermia kicks in..

How long will it take for your mind to give in.. when will you stop fighting? A day? Two days? There may still be hope, they'll come look for you right?

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Space = swim.. hold it, let go, repeat
AWSD = move.. explore!
Left-Click = interact.. hint: hold left click on driftwood to rest
Right-Click = cough.. try not to drown

F = fullscreen
R = restart
ESC = exit

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This is my entry for #LOWREZJAM

Challenge: make a whole game within a 64x64 resolution

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
